Web Developer

Hi welcome to my site, I am Adriane Maynard Tiama working as web developer.

Iam am proficient in HTML, CSS3, Javascript, Jquery, Bootstrap and Media query for the responsiveness of the website. Basic knowledge in PHP CRUD, AJAX, JSON, Angular and NPM. Background in Codeigniter, Symphony and Wordpress used in my previous projects. Using Adobe Photoshop in some photo manipulation, logo and design layouts.

Looking for new oppurtunities to expand my career in Web developing experience. Feel free to browse my site. Thank you \m/ (-_-) \m/
